WRITING.TEXT: H-tine holding it dine
Are you the girlfriend?
Nah, just the Madden curse.
Here! Here!
Where da fuck is Bun?

I think that's the mom's lap. And really effed up for her to do that.
Edit: Oops I see him now.
April fools?
I can tell you this. They have stockpiles like the ones in Atlanta. They are already making plans to move them to other locations where a event like that won't happen here.

Well that is unfortunate. You took a gamble and came up on the losing end. Some cops will do all they can to give you a terrible experience for a minor infraction and some will be understandable and may just give you a warning. That's also a gamble.

Bond out? You may do a night in city jail at most. It would be more expensive to bond out. I agree with not jailing people for most traffic offenses but some offenses you should be jailed for. People may change their minds if they got hit by a person with no license and/or insurance.
I agree. Why stop them and say "hey you don't have a license so here's a citation now drive away." I think a bigger fine plus jail time will deter most people but not all.

How do we know that she even knows how to drive? Remember driving is a privilege not a right. I know people with licenses that really don't know how to drive but at least they should certain abilities to comprehend and execute basic driving "skills" for the state of Texas. I think in addition to the driving test you should also have to take [this](https://www.drivedifferent.com/) driving test and renew every 5 years.
